overview: The short video diary is part of the 89-minute distribution band "Carstensz", within which it complements the main films Bhutan - The Search for Happiness and Carstensz - Siedma hora. It was a spectacular crossing of the Indian Himalayas by bike through the valley of Kinnaur, Spiti, Lahaul, and the sacred lake Tso Moriri to Leh. We walked 700 kilometers over broken mountain saddles, but also well-maintained military roads in close proximity to the Chinese-guarded border of Tibet. However, getting a special permit for these areas is really worth it. (distributor's official text)
title: Through the Himalayas on bicycles
